items.title: Guidance: Marine geological carbon dioxide stores: consenting lifecycle
items.summary: Technical guide for the carbon dioxide storage industry.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: countervailing duty on PET polyester from India
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the countervailing duty on PET polyester from India.

items.title: Guidance: Electricity transmission network infrastructure: Community funds
items.summary: Government expectations for how communities living near electricity transmission network infrastructure developments should benefit as a result of hosting these developments.

items.title: Research: Domestic energy affordability support schemes: impact and economic evaluation
items.summary: The final impact and economic evaluation report for the evaluations of the domestic energy affordability support schemes in the UK (2022 to 2024).

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: spending over £25,000, September 2025
items.summary: Reports on departmental spending over £25,000.

items.title: Notice: Warm Homes: Social Housing Fund Wave 3 (closed to applications)
items.summary: Funding for local authorities and social housing landlords to improve the energy performance of social homes in England.

items.title: Notice: Warm Homes: Social Housing Fund Wave 3 – successful Social Housing Landlords including local authorities and housing associations
items.summary: List of Social Housing Landlords, including local authorities and housing associations offered funding under WH:SHF to be delivered 2025 until 2028.

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: spending over £500, August 2025
items.summary: Spending by electronic purchasing card solution (ePCS), over £500.

items.title: Domestic energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly consumer price indices of fuel components in current and real terms.

items.title: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and petroleum products
items.summary: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and fuels used for home heating, plus an index of crude oil prices.

items.title: International domestic energy prices
items.summary: DESNZ publishes comparisons of industrial energy prices by consumer size against other EU and G7 countries, using data from both Eurostat and the International Energy Agency (IEA).

items.title: International non-domestic energy prices
items.summary: DESNZ publishes comparisons of non-domestic energy prices by consumer size against other EU and G7 countries, using data from both Eurostat and the International Energy Agency (IEA).

items.title: Comparisons of international road fuel prices
items.summary: Comparisons of road fuel prices against other EU countries, using data from the European Commission Oil Bulletin.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK total energy
items.summary: Data on overall energy balances of energy supply and demand in the United Kingdom.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends and Prices statistical release: 27 November 2025
items.summary: The latest provisional monthly energy production, trade, electricity generation, consumption and prices statistics produced by the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK solid fuels and derived gases
items.summary: Data on coal and coal-related products, including production, trade, consumption and stocks.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK oil and oil products
items.summary: Data on oil and oil products, including upstream production and UK refinery activity, trade, stocks and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK gas
items.summary: Data on the UK's gas sector, including production, trade and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK electricity
items.summary: Data on electricity generation, supply, consumption and fuel use for generation.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK weather
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly data on weather patterns, including temperature, heating degree days, wind speeds, sun hours and rainfall.

items.title: Official Statistics: Smart meters in Great Britain, quarterly update September 2025
items.summary: Quarterly statistics on the roll-out of smart meters in Great Britain, covering both operating and installed meters.

items.title: Official Statistics: Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics: October 2025
items.summary: Statistical release on Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics for the estimation of capital grant uptake to support the installations of low carbon technologies in domestic and non-domestic buildings.

items.title: Official Statistics: Green Homes Grant Local Authority Delivery (LAD) and Home Upgrade Grant (HUG) release, November 2025
items.summary: Data to monitor the installation of energy efficiency measures in domestic properties via Green Homes Grant Local Authority Delivery (LAD) and Home Upgrade Grant (HUG) schemes in England.

items.title: Look up considerations for trade licences under the Russia sanctions
items.summary: As part of the statutory guidance, a look-up guide listing all considerations for trade licences for certain prohibitions, and links to general licences available.

items.title: Correspondence: Ministerial letter on cyber security to small businesses
items.summary: Ministers and the National Cyber Security Centre have written an open letter to small businesses and business representative organisations about cyber security.

items.title: Policy paper: Industrial Strategy
items.summary: Strategy document setting out a new economic approach to backing the UK’s strengths, with ambitious plans for 8 high-growth sectors.

items.title: Promoting electronic invoicing across UK businesses and the public sector
items.summary: HMRC and DBT are seeking views on standardising electronic invoicing and increasing its adoption across UK businesses and the public sector.

items.title: UK Trade Tariff: duty suspensions and autonomous tariff quotas
items.summary: Temporary duty suspensions and autonomous tariff quotas (ATQs) for importing goods into the UK.

items.title: Policy paper: Review of raw cane sugar ATQ and related considerations: 2025
items.summary: A summary of the responses received by stakeholders in the 2025 engagement exercise and 2024 consultation on the future of the raw cane sugar ATQ and related considerations.

items.title: Policy paper: Reform of non-compete clauses in employment contracts: working paper
items.summary: This working paper seeks views on different options to reform non-compete clauses in employment contracts.

items.title: Policy paper: National Licensing Policy Framework for the hospitality and leisure sectors
items.summary: Strategic vision for a modern, permissive licensing system that safeguards communities while enabling hospitality and leisure to thrive.

items.title: Reforming the licensing system
items.summary: Seeking views and evidence to develop a modern, proportionate and enabling licensing system under the Licensing Act 2003.

items.title: Peter Kyle addresses guests at the SMMT Annual Dinner
items.summary: The Business and Trade Secretary delivers the key note speech at the Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT) annual dinner.

items.title: Guidance: Whistleblowing: list of prescribed people and bodies
items.summary: List of prescribed people and bodies you can report malpractice to, other than your employer.

items.title: Business support for co-operatives and non-financial mutuals
items.summary: This call for evidence invites responses on the experiences of co-operatives, non-financial mutuals and stakeholders in starting, growing and mutualising.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on ceramic tableware and kitchenware from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on ceramic tableware and kitchenware from China.

items.title: Independent report: UK-India FTA: report under Section 42 of Agriculture Act 2020
items.summary: Report pursuant to Section 42 of the Agriculture Act 2020 with respect to the UK-India Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.

items.title: British Industrial Competitiveness Scheme: consultation on scheme eligibility and approach
items.summary: We are seeking views on the proposed approach to the new British Industrial Competitiveness Scheme (BICS) and how eligible businesses should be selected.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on imports of biodiesel originating from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on imports of biodiesel originating from China.

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: workforce management information September 2025
items.summary: Reports on departmental staff numbers and costs.
